tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_outage_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_description TEXT,
  outage_start TIMESTAMP,
  outage_end TIMESTAMP,
  outage_duration INTERVAL,
  affected_nodes TEXT[]
)

CREATE TABLE network_root_causes (
  cause_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cause_description TEXT,
  incident_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES network_outage_incidents(incident_id)
)

CREATE TABLE proactive_measures (
  measure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  measure_description TEXT,
  cause_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (cause_id) REFERENCES network_root_causes(cause_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Incident (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_name VARCHAR(100),
    incident_date DATE,
    outage_duration INT,
    resolution_status VARCHAR(50)
);
